pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Saturday, October 22, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the annual Parliamentary Press Gallery Dinner.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 5:45 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact pierre.cuguen@parl.gc.ca for details.
